name: @candypoets/nipworker
description: Nostr client library with worker-based architecture using Rust WASM

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && vite build && npm run build:types
scripts.build:wasm: npm run build:wasm:main && npm run build:wasm:worker
scripts.build:wasm:main: cd nostr-main && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../src/wasm/main --no-pack && rm ../src/wasm/main/.gitignore
scripts.build:wasm:worker: cd nostr-worker && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../src/wasm/worker --no-pack && rm ../src/wasm/worker/.gitignore

author: So Tachi <sotachi@proton.me>
